content.question: A survey will be sent to dog owners to investigate their opinions on multiple topics. Which of the following questions on the survey is most likely to contribute to question-wording bias?

choices.label: How many dogs do you own?
Should responsible dog owners purchase pet insurance?
How much money do you spend on dog food each year?
How many times did you take your dogs to a vet last year?
Does your dog sleep in your bed on a regular basis?

content.answer: Should responsible dog owners purchase pet insurance?
